title: La banque russe VTB finalisera l'int√©gration d'Otkritie d'ici fin 2024
cleaned_sentences: The second lender in Russia, VTB, will complete the integration of Otkritie Bank by the end of 2024, ahead of the calendar, said Georgy Gorshkov, vice-president and chairman of the board of directors on Thursday.
The Central Bank has bail out Otkritie, who was once the largest private lender in Russia, in 2017 as part of a campaign of several years aimed at cleaning up the Russian banking sector.
It then sold Otkritie in VTB at the end of 2022 for 340 billion rubles ($ 3.68 billion).
Integration, which enabled VTB to alleviate certain capital problems after having recorded a loss of $ 7.7 billion in 2022 due to the sanctions, was to be completed in 2025.
VTB synchronized offers for retail customers and transferred certain cash loans.
"In December this year, the gradual transfer of the Otkritie branch network to the VTB brand will begin," said Gorshkov.
"This process will be fully completed by the end of 2024.
($ 1 = 92,4900 rubles) (report by Elena Fabrichnaya; editorial staff by Alexander Marrow, emelia Sithole-Matarise edition)
